title-group.article-title: So you think you have read this journal?

permissions.copyright-holder: The British Society for Surgery of the Hand

list-item.p: Is it more common for the proximal component or the distal component to subside or change position in the bone following pyrocarbon PIP joint arthroplasty?
What deformity do malunited distal radius fractures usually have in the axial plane?
The finger which takes most advantage of the Quadriga phenomena is the: Index finger, Middle finger, Ring finger or Little finger
Can FK506 (Tacrolimus) be safely prescribed after peripheral nerve suture?
Has FK506 (Tacrolimus) been demonstrated to enhance axonal regeneration after nerve repair by conventional suture or graft?
Progression of the Hoffmann-Tinel sign of 1mm/day is considered normal. How has this reference value been established?
Which tendons have had a spiral architecture described?
What novel technique is available for studies of soft connective tissues?
